category.name: Integration.Configuring CAE
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CAE_datamap_files_location
preference.preference_description: Specifies the unique ID (UID) of the item revision used to manage the data map definition files. The administrator must specify this preference for analysts to use data map or CAE Structure Map functions. Valid Values: Accepts one string as value; the string must be a valid Teamcenter object, where the value is single object string, object is a UID value (for example, 34526).
